data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.

Goal! A Yevgeni Lutsenko header gives Tula a 0-1 lead in Sochi.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a Tula throw-in in Sochi's half.
Tula push upfield but Vladislav Bezborodov quickly pulls them for offside.

Sochi drives forward and Nikita Burmistrov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.

The home team replace Kirill Zaika with Timofey Margasov.

Mikhail Levashov (Tula) has received a first yellow card.
Yevgeni Lutsenko is on target to give Tula a 1-2 advantage.
